items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes and updates instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by a user, all other team members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task status, assignee, and due date changes are reflected without requiring a page refresh.
non_functional: System latency for updates must be under 2 seconds.
Support for at least 100 concurrent active users per team.

items.title: In-app Team Chat
items.description: Provide a chat interface for team members to communicate within the app.
acceptance_criteria: Users can send and receive messages in real-time within team channels.
Chat history is stored and accessible for at least 90 days.
non_functional: Chat storage must comply with data privacy regulations.

notes: The requirement was high-level; assumptions were made about real-time updates and chat as core collaboration features.
